verses.text: \w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Nisan|strong="H5212"\w*,\f + \fr 2:1 \ft Nisan is the first month of the Hebrew lunar calendar, usually occurring within the months of March and April.\f* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w twentieth|strong="H6242"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* Artaxerxes, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*, \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w took|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w and|strong="H6242"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*. \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w sad|strong="H7451"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*,

\w so|strong="H3966"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* said \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, “\w Why|strong="H4069"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w sad|strong="H7451"\w*, \w though|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H4428"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* \w ill|strong="H2470"\w*? \w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w could|strong="H2088"\w* \w only|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3820"\w* \w sadness|strong="H7455"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.” \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3820"\w* overwhelmed \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w*

\w and|strong="H4428"\w* replied \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, “\w May|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w* \w forever|strong="H5769"\w*! \w Why|strong="H4069"\w* \w should|strong="H4069"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w sad|strong="H7489"\w* \w when|strong="H2421"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w where|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H6440"\w* fathers \w are|strong="H5892"\w* buried lies \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w ruins|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w its|strong="H5892"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* \w have|strong="H5892"\w* \w been|strong="H5769"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H2717"\w* \w by|strong="H5892"\w* fire?”

“\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w request|strong="H1245"\w*?” replied \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*. \w So|strong="H2088"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w prayed|strong="H6419"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H8064"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*

\w and|strong="H3063"\w* answered \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, “If \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w pleases|strong="H2895"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* if \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w has|strong="H4428"\w* \w found|strong="H3190"\w* \w favor|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w sight|strong="H6440"\w*, \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w ask|strong="H4428"\w* \w that|strong="H4428"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w where|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* fathers \w are|strong="H5892"\w* buried, \w so|strong="H7971"\w* \w that|strong="H4428"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w may|strong="H4428"\w* \w rebuild|strong="H1129"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w queen|strong="H7694"\w* \w seated|strong="H3427"\w* \w beside|strong="H5704"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*, \w asked|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, “\w How|strong="H4970"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w journey|strong="H4109"\w* \w take|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w*?” \w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w pleased|strong="H3190"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w time|strong="H2165"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w also|strong="H4428"\w* said \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*, “If \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w pleases|strong="H2895"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w may|strong="H4428"\w* letters \w be|strong="H5414"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w governors|strong="H6346"\w* \w west|strong="H5676"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Euphrates|strong="H5104"\w*,\f + \fr 2:7 \ft Hebrew beyond the River; also in verse 9\f* \w so|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w grant|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* safe \w passage|strong="H5674"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w reach|strong="H5414"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w may|strong="H4428"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* letter \w to|strong="H5921"\w* Asaph, \w keeper|strong="H8104"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w forest|strong="H6508"\w*, \w so|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w he|strong="H1004"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w timber|strong="H6086"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w beams|strong="H7136"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w citadel|strong="H1002"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w*, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* occupy.” \w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w gracious|strong="H2896"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w was|strong="H5892"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w granted|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* requests.

\w Then|strong="H7971"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w went|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w governors|strong="H6346"\w* \w west|strong="H5676"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Euphrates|strong="H5104"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s letters. \w The|strong="H5414"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w also|strong="H4428"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w* \w officers|strong="H8269"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w cavalry|strong="H6571"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1992"\w* \w when|strong="H8085"\w* \w Sanballat|strong="H5571"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Horonite|strong="H2772"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Tobiah|strong="H2900"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Ammonite|strong="H5984"\w* \w official|strong="H5650"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w about|strong="H8085"\w* \w this|strong="H8085"\w*, \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* deeply disturbed \w that|strong="H8085"\w* someone \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w come|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* well-being \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*. Nehemiah Inspects the Walls

\w After|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* arrived \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*,

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w at|strong="H6213"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w few|strong="H4592"\w* \w men|strong="H6213"\w*. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w anyone|strong="H3588"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w laid|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H7392"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*. \w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w only|strong="H3588"\w* animal \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w was|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w on|strong="H7392"\w* \w which|strong="H4100"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3820"\w* \w riding|strong="H7392"\w*.

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H6440"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w at|strong="H1961"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w through|strong="H6555"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Valley|strong="H1516"\w* \w Gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w toward|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Well|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Serpent|strong="H8577"\w* \f + \fr 2:13 \ft Or Dragon or Jackal\f* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Dung \w Gate|strong="H8179"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w I|strong="H6440"\w* \w inspected|strong="H7663"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w walls|strong="H2346"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w that|strong="H5869"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w broken|strong="H6555"\w* \w down|strong="H6555"\w* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* \w that|strong="H5869"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H6555"\w* \w by|strong="H3318"\w* fire.

\w Then|strong="H5674"\w* \w I|strong="H8478"\w* \w went|strong="H5674"\w* \w on|strong="H5674"\w* \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* \w Fountain|strong="H5869"\w* \w Gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w Pool|strong="H1295"\w*, \w but|strong="H4428"\w* \w there|strong="H8478"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* no \w room|strong="H4725"\w* \w for|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* animal \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w me|strong="H5674"\w* \w to|strong="H4428"\w* get \w through|strong="H5674"\w*;

\w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H1961"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* \w by|strong="H1961"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w inspected|strong="H7663"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*. \w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H1961"\w* headed \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* reentered through \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w Valley|strong="H1516"\w* \w Gate|strong="H8179"\w*.

\w The|strong="H6213"\w* \w officials|strong="H5461"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w where|strong="H4100"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w had|strong="H3045"\w* \w gone|strong="H1980"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w was|strong="H4399"\w* \w doing|strong="H6213"\w*, \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w had|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w yet|strong="H5704"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w nobles|strong="H2715"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w officials|strong="H5461"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H6213"\w* other \w workers|strong="H4399"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H7200"\w* said \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w*, “\w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w trouble|strong="H7451"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H8179"\w* \w in|strong="H3212"\w*. \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w lies|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w ruins|strong="H2717"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w its|strong="H1961"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w burned|strong="H3341"\w* \w down|strong="H3212"\w*. \w Come|strong="H1961"\w*, \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w us|strong="H7200"\w* \w rebuild|strong="H1129"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* \w of|strong="H8179"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H5750"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w disgrace|strong="H2781"\w*.”

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w also|strong="H3027"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w gracious|strong="H2896"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3027"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w*. “\w Let|strong="H5046"\w* \w us|strong="H5046"\w* \w start|strong="H2388"\w* \w rebuilding|strong="H1129"\w*,” \w they|strong="H5921"\w* replied, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w set|strong="H6965"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w work|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w But|strong="H8085"\w* \w when|strong="H8085"\w* \w Sanballat|strong="H5571"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Horonite|strong="H2772"\w*, \w Tobiah|strong="H2900"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Ammonite|strong="H5984"\w* \w official|strong="H5650"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w Geshem|strong="H1654"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Arab|strong="H6163"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w*, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w mocked|strong="H3932"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* ridiculed \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w doing|strong="H6213"\w*? \w Are|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w rebelling|strong="H4775"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*?”

\w So|strong="H6965"\w* \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w answered|strong="H7725"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w*, “\w The|strong="H7725"\w* \w God|strong="H8064"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w One|strong="H1931"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H5650"\w* grant \w us|strong="H7725"\w* \w success|strong="H6743"\w*. \w We|strong="H1697"\w*, \w His|strong="H7725"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w will|strong="H5650"\w* start \w rebuilding|strong="H1129"\w*, \w but|strong="H1931"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w have|strong="H5650"\w* \w no|strong="H2506"\w* \w portion|strong="H2506"\w*, \w right|strong="H6666"\w*, \w or|strong="H2506"\w* claim \w in|strong="H7725"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.”
